attributes.contentHtml: TheYeetster So why would you ask me to remove your IP if it wasn't valid anymore? Also that assumes that someone else got assigned your IP, knew your old company email, and created an account WITH the API key you had and stole everything

attributes.title: Galactiq - A facade of Fraud and Theft

attributes.contentHtml: Pengu What? I asked you to remove all traces of my email, name, IP and whatnot, but literally on the 13th (4 days after I was fired) I decided to change it because I remembered you kept Voll's proxy IP's even like half a year later. You do realize IP spoofing or inspect element on your part exists. Also I didn't create any accounts, that was once again, Voll, and since I see you have "logs", you should be able to check that, wouldn't you.
